summary.para: Gets the optional bundle information at the current position of the enumerator.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code that includes, but is not limited to, those in the following table.

description.para: The enumerator has passed the last item in the collection.

summary.para: Determines whether there is optional bundle information at the current position of the enumerator.

param.name: hasCurrent
param.para: TRUE if the enumerator's current position references an item; FALSE if the enumerator has passed the last item in the collection.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Advances the position of the enumerator to the next set of optional bundle information.

param.name: hasNext
param.para: TRUE if the enumerator successfully advances
FALSE if the enumerator has passed the end of the collection.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an error code.

Note When the enumerator passes the end of the collection for the first time, hasNext = FALSE, but the method succeeds and returns S_OK. However, the method returns E_BOUNDS if you subsequently call another MoveNext after you have already passed the end of the collection, and you have previously received hasNext = FALSE.

summary.para: Enumerates the optional bundle information from a bundle.
